text: @BarackObama Right! Georgia reopened (with masks & distancing) & saw a 12% *drop* in #COVID__19 cases. Sweden only locked down elderly/high-risk ppl, didn’t kill their economy, & had only 32% per capita of NY state #coronavirus deaths (3,677/10mil vs 22,478/20mil)! #KAG #KAG2020 #ChineseVirus
